alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 3:49PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Johns and east central Clay Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 349 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Picolata, or 9 miles southeast of Green Cove Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Picolata and Bakersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns
